sentence.Network_en: Rituals and festivals form an integral part of every human society.
sentence.Network_cn: 仪式与节日构成了任何人类社会不可缺少的一部分。

sentence.Network_en: Community involvement is now integral to company strategy.
sentence.Network_cn: 参与社会活动如今已是公司战略中必不可少的内容。

sentence.Network_en: Music is an integral part of the school's curriculum.
sentence.Network_cn: 音乐是这所学校的课程中基本的一环。

TOEFL词频表 - 豆丁网 ... disintegrate. 使分解，瓦解，碎裂 integral 完整的 disposal n. 处理.
... . . .频多在继承印度古代吠檀多不二论基本原理的基础上,综合各种不同的吠檀多学说,并融入大量现代科学的内容,而建立起来的一种新型哲学所谓整体(integral)一词似乎译得不准确,整体在这里包含两层意义:一层是综合不同吠檀多学说的精华,消除它们之间歧异;一层是.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from late Latin integralis, from integer 'whole' (see integer). Compare with integrate and integrity

entry.tran: 基本的;构成整体所必需的
entry.def: Something that is an integral part of something is an essential part of that thing.

example.ex: Rituals and festivals form an integral part of every human society...
example.tran: 仪式与节日构成了任何人类社会不可缺少的一部分。

example.ex: Anxiety is integral to the human condition.
example.tran: 焦虑是人类的基本生存状况之一。

means.word_mean: 1. the result of a mathematical integration; F(x) is the integral of f(x) if dF/dx = f(x)
1. existing as an essential constituent or characteristic;

sentences.sentence: "the Ptolemaic system with its built-in concept of periodicity"
"a constitutional inability to tell the truth"

means.word_mean: 2. constituting the undiminished entirety; lacking nothing essential especially not damaged;

sentences.sentence: "a local motion keepeth bodies integral"- Bacon
"was able to keep the collection entire during his lifetime"

auth_sentence.content: Recreation must form an integral part of human life.
auth_sentence.res_content: Recreation must form an integral part of human life.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Recreation must form an integral part of human life.

auth_sentence.content: Or Faynman's drawings are better than integral mess.
auth_sentence.res_content: Or Faynman's drawings are better than integral mess.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Or Faynman's drawings are better than integral mess.

auth_sentence.content: It's an integral part of a mature society.
auth_sentence.res_content: It's an integral part of a mature society.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's an integral part of a mature society.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 构成整体所必需的;完整的
stems_affixes.word_buile: integr完整+al……的→adj.构成整体所必需的;完整的
integrate[v.[into,with][使]成为一体,[使]结合在一起]+ion表名词→n.综合
integr完整+ity表名词→n.正直,诚实;完整,完全
dis分开+integrate成为一体→v.分裂成小片,瓦解
integr完整+ate使……→v.[into,with][使]成为一体,[使]结合在一起

Sentence.sentence: We see the potential for capture and storage to play an integral role in reducing emissions," says Kim Corley, Shell's senior advisor of CO2 and environmental affairs.

means.word_mean: 构成整体所必需的; 不可或缺的

sentences.en: That's an integral part of the country.
sentences.cn: 那是构成国家所必需的一部分。

sentences.en: She is our best player, and is integral to our team.
sentences.cn: 她是我们最好的球员, 我们队离不开她。

jushi.chinese: 那是构成国家所必需的一部分。
